title: NFL Owners meetings, Cardinals fan Blake Shelton, Super Bowl Champ Aquib Talib, Scary teams in Week 8, and Fantasy Football picks
itunes:title: NFL Owners meetings, Cardinals fan Blake Shelton, Super Bowl Champ Aquib Talib, Scary teams in Week 8, and Fantasy Football picks
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Shaun O'Hara get updates from the NFL Owners meetings in New York. We hear NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell addressing the WFT emails and discuss Deshaun Watson questions. Country star and Cardinals fan Blake Shelton drops by to preview Arizona's TNF matchup against the Packers. Super Bowl Champion Aquib Talib tells us why he's picking the Rams in the NFC. Plus, we get Fantasy Football picks and the scariest teams heading into NFL Week 8.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
